summary: In this context, chlorobenzene is examined in relation to its oxidation processes, specifically through flow reactor experiments and chemical-kinetic modeling. The study draws parallels between the oxidation pathways of chlorobenzene and benzene, indicating that understanding the oxidation of chlorobenzene is crucial for developing comprehensive chemical-kinetic models. The focus on reaction pathways and decomposition products highlights the significance of oxidation in the behavior of chlorobenzene under specific conditions.
